description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Moslem Noble; his land and people. With some notices of the Parsees or ancient Persians. ... With illustrations from original drawings by the author" Author: POSTANS, afterwards YOUNG, Marianne. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10055.e.23.", "British Library OC T 35876" Page: 189 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1857 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002967323 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
